description: Bank of America is warning customers of a data breach exposing their personal information after one of its service providers was hacked last year. [...]
title: Bank of America warns customers of data breach after vendor hack

description: The FBI dismantled the Warzone RAT malware operation, seizing infrastructure and arresting two individuals associated with the cybercrime operation. [...]
title: FBI seizes Warzone RAT infrastructure, arrests malware vendor

description: Starting March 13th, telecommunications companies must report data breaches impacting customers' personally identifiable information within 30 days, as required by FCC's updated data breach reporting requirements. [...]
title: FCC orders telecom carriers to report PII data breaches within 30 days

description: Microsoft is testing a new "Automatic Super Resolution" AI-assisted upscaling feature that increases the video and image quality of supported games while also making them run more smoothly. [...]
title: Microsoft tests Windows 11 ‘Super Resolution’ AI-upscaling for gamers

description: A phishing campaign detected in late November 2023 has compromised hundreds of user accounts in dozens of Microsoft Azure environments, including those of senior executives. [...]
title: Ongoing Microsoft Azure account hijacking campaign targets executives

description: CISA warns that a Roundcube email server vulnerability patched in September is now actively exploited in cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks. [...]
title: CISA: Roundcube email server bug now exploited in attacks

description: Hackers are exploiting a server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in Ivanti Connect Secure, Policy Secure, and ZTA gateways to deploy the new DSLog backdoor on vulnerable devices. [...]
title: Hackers exploit Ivanti SSRF flaw to deploy new DSLog backdoor

description: South Korean researchers have publicly disclosed an encryption flaw in the Rhysida ransomware encryptor, allowing the creation of a Windows decryptor to recover files for free. [...]
title: Free Rhysida ransomware decryptor for Windows exploits RNG flaw

description: At least 18 hospitals in Romania were knocked offline after a ransomware attack took down their healthcare management system. [...]
title: Ransomware attack forces 18 Romanian hospitals to go offline

description: At least 21 hospitals in Romania were knocked offline after a ransomware attack took down their healthcare management system. [...]
title: Ransomware attack forces 21 Romanian hospitals to go offline
